title: Shenandoah National Park: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations       Shenandoah Scenes is a video series that highlights the unique stories that make Shenandoah National Park so special.      Shenandoah Trip Planning focuses on videos to help you plan your trip to Shenandoah National Park.      Education in Shenandoah National Park contains interactive curriculum programs designed for use in the classroom, as well as short videos that prepare groups for their field trip to the park.        Our Changing World is a series of videos that shows how our changing climate affects the air we breathe, the views we see, and the animals we cherish.
